hero.name: Jan Pakos
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.description: I am a dedicated software developer with a strong focus on building modern web applications. My expertise includes creating efficient, scalable, and user-centric solutions. While I specialize in backend development with Python and Java, I am also proficient in frontend and full-stack development. I am open to exploring opportunities that align with my skills and interests. Additionally, I am an amateur fitness enthusiast and football player.

degreefinance.title: B.Sc. Business Administration (Finance)
degreefinance.description: I used Microsoft Excel for financial calculations, PowerPoint for presentations, and Word for collaborative writing during my studies. My curriculum covered management, financial statistics, and accounting. I also used R to build ARIMA models on time series data. My bachelorâ€™s thesis analyzed historical stock data for statistically significant deviations from expectations.

degreecs.title: Bachelor of Computer and Systems Sciences
degreecs.description: I gained proficiency in designing and implementing programs using UML and Java, as well as in UI/UX design and databases with SQL, during these studies.

coursecs50.title: CS50's Introduction to Computer Science
coursecs50.description: An introduction to algorithms, data structures, web development, and more, using languages such as C, Python and SQL.

coursecs50w.title: CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript
coursecs50w.description: Web development with Django, React, and SQL. Topics include database design, scalability, security, and user experience.
